summary: In a teardrop-shaped land called Sangarashtra, a 9-year-old girl with special healing powers tries to save her homeland from the tyranny of an evil queen with the help of a blind swordsman.
cast: Siddharth|Shruti Haasan|Lakshmi Manchu|Ravi Babu|Harshitha|Tanikella Bharani|Vallabhaneni Ramji|Ali|Brahmanandam|Gunjan Bakshi|Ananth|Hari Teja|Madhavi|Subbaraju|Subbaraya Sarma|Satyanarayana Kaikala|Subhas|John|Phani Eggone|Mahesh|Sunitha|Ravi Shankar|Charan|Sudarshan|Bhaskar|Dhulapali
title: Anaganaga O Dheerudu
